transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hi sir, good morning. Good morning sir.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Sir, main Hemant baat kar raha tha senior manager IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Sir aapko ek feedback receive hua tha hamare paas aapne whatsapp pe reply kiya tha not satisfy karke 4 November ko.
Customer: Nahi woh galti se galti se.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi aapne waise bhi services ke liye bataya hai ki sir aapko relevant aur small quantity ki buyleads aa rahi hai toh mujhe isse bhi discuss karna tha sir kahin kahin.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Woh baat alag hai magar woh uss din jo hua woh galti se ho gaya tha. I was handling the car and handling the mobile.
Executive: Accha accha accha.
Customer: I deleted it from my text okay.
Executive: Okay okay no issue because of that feedback regarding that executive is not for IndiaMART services.
Customer: No no it is not the question of satisfied or not satisfied. I would say not satisfied only when I took the services properly and I am able to utilize it properly.
Executive: Okay okay yeah sure sure.
Customer: And if I use it properly and then say that not satisfied then it is okay. Without using it if I am saying not satisfied then it is wrong. So I will not do that. So just okay just be sorry about that. Okay.
Executive: Okay no issue no no need to say sorry sir. I have not did the mistake. Okay I understood by mistake you have clicked on that option or not satisfied I totally agree. But just I want sir when you start using the IndiaMART in proper way sir any suitable time or you are hiring someone to.
Customer: Yes yes yes yes we are hiring. Finding out somebody who can handle all the inquiries properly.
Executive: Okay okay okay.
Customer: And and and one more thing sir I just once how much time it will take to hire someone sir because it already have completed two months sir.
Customer: Let us see.
Customer: Not one or two already is already is finalized. In this month we should finalize it.
Executive: Okay okay no issue sir take your time but I will recommend sir till till that you not hire someone please use the services sir. Don't stop using the services because it impact your visibility. Suppose sir if you hire someone after one month okay he will start using the services he will not get the relevant buyleads because you already listed your listing is down sir. Okay. So if you consume daily basis one or two buyleads relevant regarding your product maybe small quantity but consume them sir because you have paid for the buyleads sir. If you did not consume the buyleads buyleads will going to expire. So consume the retail buyleads connect to the buyer keep promote your catalog sir. Okay promote your catalog suppose some buyer is there today he need a retail quality retail buyleads but in future maybe it possible he need a bulk order also. If he have your contact number he will connect you. Okay sir. So from right now sir I am closing this concern you will get another feedback in your mail please give your satisfied on that mail sir okay and I am after I ask my executive to connect you after a week regarding your services and to the feedback sir okay.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay any any other issue sir any other issue apart from this.
Executive: Okay sir and one more thing sir you dealing in the wooden pellets also.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: You are deal you are dealing in wooden pellet also.
Customer: Wooden pellet we are not wooden pellet only bamboo.
Executive: Okay. Okay bamboo just great sir.
Executive: Okay bamboo pellets 8mm bamboo biomass pellets right 8mm.
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Any other sir only 8mm or 6 7mm also sir.
Customer: Only 8mm only 8mm.
Executive: Only 8mm okay okay okay only 8mm okay like bamboo bamboo bamboo and pan India or sir nearby location.
Customer: Actually pan India is difficult because what happens the transportation will cost more.
Executive: I understood totally understood sir. Ha so you will want to deal in the nearby location like Maharashtra only right Maharashtra Goa maybe.
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Customer: Maybe Chhattisgarh.
Customer: Chhattisgarh.
Executive: Chhattisgarh also you can deal. Or Andhra Tamil Nadu like that. Not Tamil Nadu but Andhra Telangana.
Executive: Sir I can see that in your product line very good response sir. Very good response and you can get benefits from IndiaMART services but you have to utilize it proper way sir. Then only you will get the benefit sir otherwise sir you will consume in your in one month and one day and you will not get the benefit sir. You have to active on the portal and consume the buyleads on daily basis. Okay right now sir I am closing your concern you will get the feedback regarding our services or executive please satisfy it okay.
Customer: Okay thank you.
Executive: Thank you so much for your time sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer accidentally marked 'not satisfied' in feedback.

- Getting relevant and small quantity buyleads.

- Enquiring about wooden pellets.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the feedback issue.

- Executive suggested utilizing services until hiring someone.

- Clarified the customer deals in bamboo pellets.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send another feedback mail.

- Executive will ask team to connect after a week.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, buyleads, bamboo pellets, subscription
